nodes.id: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

zh-cn: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

location.zh-cn: 辽宁省沈阳市沈河区北站路110甲
location.en: No. 110A, Beizhan Road, Shenhe District, Shenyang City, Liaoning Province

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省的铁路运输中级法院，属于专门人民法院。
description.en: A railway transport intermediate court in Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China, which is a type of special people's court.

description.zh-cn: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院院长。
description.en: President of the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省的最高审判机关。
description.en: The highest judicial organ in Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省的地方国家权力机关。
description.en: The local state power organ of Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 辽宁省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 辽宁省人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Liaoning Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 辽宁省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the Liaoning Provincial People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党辽宁省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党辽宁省委员会
en: Liaoning Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在辽宁省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Liaoning Province.

nodes.id: 中国共产党沈阳铁路运输中级法院党组

zh-cn: 中国共产党沈阳铁路运输中级法院党组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在沈阳铁路运输中级法院设立的领导机构。
description.en: The leading party organ of the Communist Party of China established within the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在特定部门或领域设立的法院，如军事法院、海事法院、铁路运输法院等。
description.en: Courts established by the People's Republic of China in specific departments or fields, such as military courts, maritime courts, and railway transport courts.

en: Constitution of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的根本大法。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国人民法院组织法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人民法院组织法
en: Organic Law of the People's Courts of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 规定中华人民共和国人民法院组织和职权的法律。
description.en: The law that stipulates the organization and functions of the people's courts of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国铁道部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国铁道部
en: Ministry of Railways of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 曾是中华人民共和国国务院主管铁路运输的组成部门。
description.en: Formerly a constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of railway transportation.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国司法部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国司法部
en: Ministry of Justice of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管司法行政的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of judicial administration.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上曾存在的铁路运输专门法院体系中的高级法院。
description.en: A high court within the historical system of special railway transport courts in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省沈阳市的铁路运输基层法院。
description.en: A basic-level railway transport court in Shenyang, Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国吉林省长春市的铁路运输基层法院。
description.en: A basic-level railway transport court in Changchun, Jilin Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省大连市的铁路运输基层法院。
description.en: A basic-level railway transport court in Dalian, Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省丹东市的铁路运输基层法院。
description.en: A basic-level railway transport court in Dandong, Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国辽宁省锦州市的铁路运输基层法院。
description.en: A basic-level railway transport court in Jinzhou, Liaoning Province, People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

description.zh-cn: 王海霞担任沈阳铁路运输中级法院院长。
description.en: Wang Haixia serves as the President of the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court.

relationships.source: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

description.zh-cn: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院的上诉法院和业务上级是辽宁省高级人民法院。
description.en: The appellate court and operational superior of the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court is the Liaoning High People's Court.

relationships.source: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

description.zh-cn: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院的组织上级是辽宁省人民代表大会。
description.en: The organizational superior of the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court is the Liaoning Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.source: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院
relationships.target: 辽宁省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院的组织上级是辽宁省人民代表大会常务委员会。
description.en: The organizational superior of the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court is the Standing Committee of the Liaoning Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.source: 中国共产党沈阳铁路运输中级法院党组
relationships.target: 中国共产党辽宁省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党沈阳铁路运输中级法院党组的中共上级是中国共产党辽宁省委员会。
description.en: The CCP superior of the Party Leadership Group of the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court is the Liaoning Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党沈阳铁路运输中级法院党组
relationships.target: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党沈阳铁路运输中级法院党组是设立在法院内的中共本级组织。
description.en: The Party Leadership Group of the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court is the local-level CCP organization established within the court.

relationships.target: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国宪法是沈阳铁路运输中级法院的授权法源。
description.en: The Constitution of the People's Republic of China is the authorizing legal source for the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国人民法院组织法
relationships.target: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人民法院组织法是沈阳铁路运输中级法院的组织法规。
description.en: The Organic Law of the People's Courts of the People's Republic of China is the organizational statute for the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国铁道部
relationships.target: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

description.zh-cn: 1979年12月1日，根据中华人民共和国铁道部、司法部的通知，沈阳铁路运输中级法院开始筹建。
description.en: On December 1, 1979, based on a notice from the Ministry of Railways and the Ministry of Justice of the People's Republic of China, preparatory work for the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court began.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国司法部
relationships.target: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

description.zh-cn: 1979年12月1日，根据中华人民共和国铁道部、司法部的通知，沈阳铁路运输中级法院开始筹建。
description.en: On December 1, 1979, based on a notice from the Ministry of Railways and the Ministry of Justice of the People's Republic of China, preparatory work for the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court began.

relationships.target: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

description.zh-cn: 根据铁路运输高级法院的文件通知，沈阳铁路运输中级法院于1981年12月25日正式成立。
description.en: According to a document notice from the Railway Transport High Court, the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court was formally established on December 25, 1981.

relationships.target: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

description.zh-cn: 2011年，沈阳铁路运输中级法院实行改制，其人事及经费保障改由辽宁省负责。
description.en: In 2011, the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court underwent a reform, and the responsibility for its personnel and funding was transferred to Liaoning Province.

relationships.target: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

description.zh-cn: 沈阳铁路运输法院是沈阳铁路运输中级法院对应的铁路运输基层法院。
description.en: The Shenyang Railway Transport Court is a basic-level railway transport court corresponding to the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court.

relationships.target: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

description.zh-cn: 锦州铁路运输法院是沈阳铁路运输中级法院对应的铁路运输基层法院。
description.en: The Jinzhou Railway Transport Court is a basic-level railway transport court corresponding to the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court.

relationships.target: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

description.zh-cn: 大连铁路运输法院是沈阳铁路运输中级法院对应的铁路运输基层法院。
description.en: The Dalian Railway Transport Court is a basic-level railway transport court corresponding to the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court.

relationships.target: 沈阳铁路运输中级法院

description.zh-cn: 丹东铁路运输法院是沈阳铁路运输中级法院对应的铁路运输基层法院。
description.en: The Dandong Railway Transport Court is a basic-level railway transport court corresponding to the Shenyang Railway Transport Intermediate Court.
